-- | Downloads, Parses and Saves the data to the DB from Bank Holidays API

conn = do
    -- url for JSON data for bank holidays in UK from 2017 to 2023

    let url :: URL
url = URL
"https://www.gov.uk/bank-holidays.json"

json) of
                Left URL

print URL
err
                Right Record
recs -> do
                    URL -> IO ()

print URL
"Parsing Done"
